titles.title: A resolution supporting fair and equitable grading treatment for exports of United States wheat products to Canada.
A resolution supporting fair and equitable grading treatment for exports of United States wheat products to Canada.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Expresses the sense of the Senate that:
Canada should grade Canadian produced wheat in the same manner as U.S. produced wheat and be fair to U.S. agricultural producers, and the President should examine whether Canadian wheat grading laws adhere to trade agreements and insist on full access for U.S. wheat exporters to the Canadian market.
